text: Robert John Wilson (23 May 1943 - October 2020) was an English professional footballer. He was born in Birmingham, England. He played for Aston Villa, Cardiff City and for Exeter City. His career lasted from 1961 to 1976. Wilson died in October 2020 at the age of 77.Remembering Bob Wilson: 1943-2020 ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2020 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Bristol City F.C. players Category:Cardiff City F.C. players Category:Sportspeople from Birmingham
title: Bob Wilson (footballer, born 1943)
